Author.item: Porter, T. M.; Golding, G. B.; King, C.; Froese, D.; Zazula, G.; Poinar, H. N.

Title.item: Amplicon pyrosequencing late Pleistocene permafrost: the removal of putative contaminant sequences and small-scale reproducibility

Excluded.item: Samples taken from near Bear Creek, East of Dawson City, on Klondike River.
